EmailTemplate.name: BAP Login reminder 90 Days
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder - 90 days since last BAP login
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Itâ€™s been 90 days since you last logged in your Business Automation Platform (BAP) account. If you want to retain your access, please login to BAP within the next 15 days or your account will be automatically deactivated. Once deactivated you will need to submit a request to have the account re-established. Thank you!
